item.title: ‘Alien: Earth’ Star David Rysdahl on the Lost Boys Viewing Arthur as a ‘Parental Figure,’ Distrusting Prodigy Corporation and More
item.description: SPOILER ALERT: This story contains spoilers from “Observation,” Season 1, Episode 4 of “Alien: Earth,” now streaming on Hulu. After Wendy (Sydney Chandler) fought off a Xenomor
